post.summary: Mobile verification using SMS verification code
send a new verification code after 2 minutes after the last verification code sent

200.description: success and sent new sms verification code

403.description: You will receive this response when you request again less than 2 minutes after the last request

parameters.name: flag
parameters.description: flag all for get all categories. flag active for get active categories.

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: add this parameter if you want to create a subcategory, otherwise it is not required

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether a category is active or not This parameter is 1 by default

parameters.name: parent_id
parameters.description: if you want to change category parent add this parameter, otherwise it is not required

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: if you want to change category name add this parameter, otherwise it is not required

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: if you want to change category active column add this parameter, otherwise it is not required

parameters.name: exist
parameters.description: Whether a product is exist or not(true by default)

parameters.name: exist
parameters.description: Whether a role is active or not

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether a role is active or not

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether a role is active or not
